description: Styles for managing themes and layout of the simple todo list application. The file includes CSS variables for light and dark themes, styling for the main application components, and responsive design rules.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main container for the application, center-aligned with theme-dependent background and text colors.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Style for the application logo, including animation effects.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header section of the application which includes styling for layout and appearance.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Link styling based on theme variables.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button for toggling between light and dark themes with hover and active effects.

methods.name: App-logo-spin
methods.description: Keyframes animation for spinning the app logo.
